entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
